```
swagger: "2.0"
...
paths:
  /tickets:
    get:
      tags:
      - "tickets"
      summary: "Send an JSON Object as a query param"
      parameters:
      - name: "params"
        in: "path"
        description: "{\"type\":\"foo\",\"color\":\"green\"}"
        required: true
        type: "string" 
```

```
openapi: 3.0.1
...
paths:
  /tickets:
    get:
      tags:
      - tickets
      summary: Send an JSON Object as a query param
      parameters:
      - name: params
        in: query
        description: '{"type":"foo","color":"green"}'
        required: true
        schema:
          type: object
          properties:
            type:
              type: "string"
            color:
              type: "string" 
```
